summary: Transform the current layout from a 7x2 grid to a 5x3 grid, adjusting existing content and adding new cells as needed.

steps.task: Transform the current grid layout from 7x2 to 5x3, creating new cells and adjusting existing ones to fit the new dimensions. The new grid should maintain consistent spacing and alignment.
Determine the common layout and styling properties for all cells in the new 5x3 grid, ensuring consistency across all cells, both existing and newly created.
Adjust the content of the cell at grid position (1,1) to fit the new 5x3 grid layout.
Adjust the content of the cell at grid position (1,2) to fit the new 5x3 grid layout.
Create content for the new cell at grid position (1,3) based on the common grid cell layout.
Adjust the content of the cell at grid position (2,1) to fit the new 5x3 grid layout.
Adjust the content of the cell at grid position (2,2) to fit the new 5x3 grid layout.
Create content for the new cell at grid position (2,3) based on the common grid cell layout.
Adjust the content of the cell at grid position (3,1) to fit the new 5x3 grid layout.
Adjust the content of the cell at grid position (3,2) to fit the new 5x3 grid layout.
Create content for the new cell at grid position (3,3) based on the common grid cell layout.
Adjust the content of the cell at grid position (4,1) to fit the new 5x3 grid layout.
Adjust the content of the cell at grid position (4,2) to fit the new 5x3 grid layout.
Create content for the new cell at grid position (4,3) based on the common grid cell layout.
Adjust the content of the cell at grid position (5,1) to fit the new 5x3 grid layout.
Adjust the content of the cell at grid position (5,2) to fit the new 5x3 grid layout.
Create content for the new cell at grid position (5,3) based on the common grid cell layout.
